Help:Node.title: Command Usage: !notes
Help:Node.Log:Description:
COMMAND USAGE: !notes [user]
EXAMPLE: !notes joeblow
Lists all of the administrative notes associated with a user. Note that you may have to use the !finger command to get the user name associated with a particular character. This is a great place to list problems with or good stuff about a particular user, as it will be seen in every Skotos game.
SEE ALSO: !addnote, !finger, !killnote
